title: www.hypefortype.com logo font
content:
What is [www.hypefortype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016035715/http:/www.hypefortype.com/ "www.hypefortype.com") logo font?  
Is it font or not?
author: antrepo

comments.content:
If it weren't for the "s" shown elsewhere, I would say fontstruction.  
With so many geometric typefaces out there, your best chance is e-mailing them directly.
